pages.text: The $(mob)Cyan Flower$() is a passive mob that spawns in grassy biomes in the $(thing)Overworld$(). When approached by the player or struck with a weapon, it may drop flowers or turn into a $(l:grimoireofgaia:mandragora)$(mob)Mandragora$().
If it does not turn into a $(l:grimoireofgaia:mandragora)$(mob)Mandragora$() when provoked, the $(mob)Cyan Flower$() can drop $(item)Flowers$() on death.
